info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 13 at 5:09PM EDT until September 14 at 5:08AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Still River At Brookfield affecting Litchfield and Fairfield Counties. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 515 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Water floods lowlands along the Still River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady near a crest of 12.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Wed 4 pm: 12.2 Forecast: Wed 11 pm 12.0 Thu 5 am 11.5 Thu 11 am 10.9 Thu 5 pm 10.6 Thu 11 pm 10.2 &&
